website_summaries.verdict: An easy-to-assemble pop-up net that's reasonably durable and can be used indoors on beds and outdoors over patio or poolside furniture.
pros: Pops up in seconds for mosquito protection wherever you need it, indoors or outdoors
Fits nicely over a queen-sized bed and can accommodate two adults
cons: It's challenging to fold for storage
Tiny insects may be able to pass through the mesh

customer_reviews.title: ... play with my sugar gliders in and I absolutely love it. Its very easy to store away and ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to play with my sugar gliders in and I absolutely love it. Its very easy to store away and when you take it out, it pops open immediately, and you can pull out the sides to make it stand up. I've had it for about a month now and I haven't noticed any rips or tears in the material, which is surprising because my glider's nails are fairly sharp and they occasionally bite on it too. I would definitely recommend this to anybody with sugar gliders or anybody who is looking for a reliable mosquito net tent.
customer_reviews.author: rachel kulhanek

customer_reviews.title: 2 year old containment: success!
customer_reviews.text: Worked awesome for our 7 day holiday trip with our 2 year, 4 month old ACTIVE toddler. Was sized for a full size mattress, with some room to spare. Since we were in one room together, having a sheet cover the tent made it so we didn’t have to worry about light waking her up during noontime naps and 7pm bedtime. We kept one side “open”, though, so we could still watch her from the other room via our portable baby monitor. Great value!
customer_reviews.author: Appa

customer_reviews.title: Great seller! Very responsive!
customer_reviews.text: It’s a really good mosquito net. Very roomy. We travel with it to countries where dengeu fever and Zika virasus are prevelant, and makes our life so much safer! There’s room for both my husband and I, and we place it on a king bed. The seller is also very good, and very responsive! I would definitely trust them and use them again!
customer_reviews.author: Anita M

customer_reviews.title: Glider-Proof
customer_reviews.text: Super quality netting. Our sugar gliders love their new tent, and our youngest who loves to chew hasn't ripped it up yet. Highly recommend. This tent is huge! Four adults could sit in each corner and have enough room to move around in here. I'd say it's almost 5' tall too. Our gliders love to run around it, and I love that the bottom is entirely netted in so they can't escape. Easy to pop up, easy to fold away, and even has a little carrying bag to put it in. Best investment $25.00 can buy for sugar glider fun time.
customer_reviews.author: kbrooks311

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t recommend if you want to keep anything besides a larger insect out.
customer_reviews.text: Great for larger bugs.. however ants and anything else.. it’s useless. There are so many smaller insects that got inside. I wouldn’t recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi O.

customer_reviews.title: traveling to Uganda
customer_reviews.text: Visiting a missionary in Uganda. He has mosquito nets over the beds, but some children are sleeping on the floor without any protection. I purchased 5 to take with me for them. Will see how they work. Plan to purchase some small tarps and place the nets on top of the tarps. They are easy to assemble,but it does take a little practice to fold them back up. I watched the video about 4 times before I got it.
customer_reviews.author: learning2b

customer_reviews.title: Great idea, super safe, easy to install
customer_reviews.text: I traveled to the tropics on a sailboat and this saved me every night. It was super easy to install and super easy to stow. The zippers worked well and it was sturdy enough to withstand climbing in and out often. I will never travel without it.
customer_reviews.author: Nellie Kellett

customer_reviews.title: Fun and function
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to enjoy the bar hammock for star gazing . BINGO!! Light-duty appropriate at this price point. Could snag if rough on it My low profile beach lounge chair fits. I could see tent camping inside tent or bed of truck on fireworks night if you are a gnat-magnet. Super easy set up on night pesky flies get in your room, or you spy a *gasp* spider ..
customer_reviews.author: A Kern

customer_reviews.title: Outdoor use
customer_reviews.text: There's been enough reviews of this product, but I just wanted to add, if your using this for outdoor use, the zippered entrance has a very low clearance when on the ground or grass, making it hard to get in and out. It may not be an options for extremely tall people. I am 5' 7" and found it cumbersome to get in and out. However, it is a cheap alternative to being outdoors and avoiding mosquitoes and other flying insects. The netting at the bottom, although seems strong, I however put a beach mat at the bottom for an extra layer of support.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Grady

customer_reviews.title: Love love love!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best purchase I have ever made!! Some gnats do get inside the tent but they will stay at the top trying to get out. No mosquitos whatsoever!! It’s so nice to sit outside and feel a breeze without bugs or mosquitos all over you. It’s so easy to get out and pop open. I have to spend a few minutes getting it back into the bag, that could just be operator error. Still super worth it! -also, it is actually super durable. I had a 2 year old try to claw out of it, it doesn’t snag or rip like I thought it would!
customer_reviews.author: Kaylin w

customer_reviews.title: works as designed good price
customer_reviews.text: well made! netting seems fairly strong , unfolds easy but folding up there's a tick to it. written instructions not good for folding up. the video is the key. I had to watch a couple of times. but once you get it folds fairly easy. So get it and have bug free relaxing time.
customer_reviews.author: Denis T.

customer_reviews.title: Using to keep bugs off potted vegetables
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to put potted vegetables inside to keep bugs off of them. It has been basically perfect for that purpose. Sunlight and water can easily get through the net to the plants, but bugs cannot. Every morning I climb inside and hand-pollinate. This has worked well to solve a pest problem that I had otherwise been unable to solve organically. The only downside is that the net tears easily. I have literally torn it with just the sole of my sneaker. I don't think I will likely get more than one season's use. I wish the netting were a but sturdier but all in all I have been pretty pleased with the purchase for this purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Beach Lover

customer_reviews.title: Can be used as a safety net for caterpillars
customer_reviews.text: I use it for my Monarch, Gulf Fritillary and Swallow tail caterpillars!! It is awesome!!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Great for small critters!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a travel tent for my sugar gliders while we went home to visit family. They loved it! plenty of space for toys and for people to sit and visit them! It is kind of a pain to fold but that has been the only issue!! My only question to other sugar parents are how do you wash it when it needs it?
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Chase

customer_reviews.title: Sad waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Ripped apart had to throw away after one use. Got it for camping trip and finally got to use it and was disappointed at hope shipper it lasted. It was ripped mins of being set up
customer_reviews.author: Tiff

customer_reviews.title: Best invention!
customer_reviews.text: Took this to Mexico and everyone thought this was a cool invention to keep the mosquitoes away. You can extend it to make it wider to fit the bed or push it in & it gets higher from the top. You can fit two adults and two children, or 5 kids. It is a bit tricky to fold back but you will eventually manage by looking at the directions they provide. It is extremely spacious and you don’t feel trapped nor suffocated. I highly recommend if traveling !!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jarenite

customer_reviews.title: Awesome outdoor play tent for kids
customer_reviews.text: A well-constructed, versatile net tent. We have a bit of a wasp problem so we got this for our son to play outside without worrying about him getting stung. It is big/tall enough for us to put a chair for us to sit on and still have a lot of room for him to play. High recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Mololock

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend
customer_reviews.text: We took a chance on purchasing this item for our trip to the Islands of the Pacific. It was worth it! It was very easy to install, easy to use. Why I gave a 4 stars instead of 5,because the net did not allow air flow, which made the inside hot. However, it did keep mosquito out. I would recommend this product especially if you are in an area with lots of mosquitos.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for protecting
customer_reviews.text: This item is great for protecting sensitive plants from bugs! We have lots of butterflies that like to land on our plants and I found I was spraying for caterpillars more often then I liked. This eliminates the bugs being able to get onto the plant and keeps them safe until harvest.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya Riendeau

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for international travel
customer_reviews.text: This fit very well in our large luggage for international travel. Three of us slept in this and we had no bites. My baby was well protected in this and felt comfortable to sleep through the night. We actually left it as it was requested to keep it and now we have to purchase another one. Two adults and a baby can fit, three adults may be tight and compromise the structure.
customer_reviews.author: C. Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Wish I found this sooner!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to setup and mildly difficult to fold back up but the pictures on the bag you store it in really helped! I felt safe and secure sleeping inside it. I use it for camping and am made fun of for having a "tent" inside a tent, but bugs, mosquitos, and spiders get inside my tent all the time but with this mosquito net tent I didn't have to worry. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kalia Yang

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and stands up to use outside
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use outside as a garden net to protect plants from bugs and birds. It works great for that purpose. I do need to keep a few heavy weights in it when the plants are not in in it, so that it does not blow away, but that is my only minor nitpick. While allowing a lot of sun to get inside, it is still sturdy and well made. I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: LJ

customer_reviews.title: It's okay
customer_reviews.text: We initially bought this because we didn't want our baby girl to get bitten by anything and we didn't want to use any bug repellent. The concept is cool I guess but it keeps moving around. I wish there was a way to keep it still. I had to keep getting up at night to fix it and it was so annoying that we don't use it anymore. Maybe it'll be good for camping
customer_reviews.author: Christina Y

customer_reviews.title: Good quality in reusing it over a 9 day trip ...
customer_reviews.text: worth the price for comfort against flying biting insects. Good quality in reusing it over a 9 day trip on a king size bed. Blankets go on the inside to sleep. Just a chore to get in and out in the middle of the night, but good piece of mind. Does fold to fit in checked luggage and made a round trip for next time.
customer_reviews.author: Mik

customer_reviews.title: The tent is great... except the zip of the zipper fell off within the first day
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this tent. I think the lace is lovely and it's convenient to pop it up and tuck it back into it's bag when it's not needed. But the zip on the zipper fell off of one side within the first day which is very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: This is the best one.
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy the other crap out there. We used these on a trip daily for four weeks and it worked great. I bought smaller tent pole ones for the kids that were just crap. Folding it up takes some effort, but not bad and you do need a large suitcase for it.
customer_reviews.author: RYAN B. MOORE

customer_reviews.title: but the design isn't perfect..
customer_reviews.text: It's fairly durable, which I appreciate, but the design isn't perfect...You have to put the mattress inside the tent, and it's not easy to do. But like I said, it's very durable, and hasn't ripped yet despite my kid's best efforts.
customer_reviews.author: Hilary1121

customer_reviews.title: Won’t recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I was getting bug bites while sitting in this tent. Bought for baby for baseball games for older bro’s. Would NOT recommend.
customer_reviews.author: J.P.A

customer_reviews.title: Great for tent time with a sugar glider
customer_reviews.text: Bought to spend tent time with my sugar glider. He loves the amount of room he gets to play and glide. Easy set up, folding down the first time is easy....the second looping can be tricky to get it to fit back into the bag. Once folded down it travels nicely
customer_reviews.author: Hope

customer_reviews.title: Could be better
customer_reviews.text: my product was four days late from its original arrival date. When I finally got it I opened it up and noticed an odor. It's an unpleasant sweet smell that is surprisingly strong for the thin material that it is. There's a lot of small little debris inside the tent that I had to pick out, and there are some mysterious brown stains on the fabric as well. Pretty disappointed for the whole experience.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Great for light outdoor use
customer_reviews.text: I got this so my daughter could hang out with me while I hung laundry outside. It's roomy and easy to set up and zips well. It's fully enclosed, but I still put a picnic blanket down inside because our grass is kind of pokey and the fabric is thin. It's easy to fold and has a nice flat bag for storage. I think it would be somewhat awkward to use this on a bed, but it's great for the yard.
customer_reviews.author: Aiko

customer_reviews.title: 💜
customer_reviews.text: I got this I have 10 time with my Sugar Gliders they love playing in it however it’s a pain to have to fold so end up just getting it folded a little bit and stick it in a huge garbage bag
customer_reviews.author: Cris

customer_reviews.title: Don't leave the case in the sun!
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had a chance to try it yet, but I'm confident of the construction. My complaint is with the case. I made the mistake of storing it in a sunny spot and the case disintegrated to dust!
customer_reviews.author: M23669

customer_reviews.title: Very effective
customer_reviews.text: I used this while in villages in Ivory Coast. Others who were with me and didn't have a net... full of bites from fleas, mosquitoes and chiggers. Me... not a single one!
customer_reviews.author: Pia Monique Murray

customer_reviews.title: Don’t do it
customer_reviews.text: This is way too expensive for the quality. It only lasted one night and the zippers came off the track and stopped zipping up. Don’t waste your money. It is cheaply made,
customer_reviews.author: NikNik

customer_reviews.title: Keeps mosquitoes out.
customer_reviews.text: Works pretty well for sitting outside and on the bed. Only down side was I kept getting bees in the tent when they followed me in to the door so I had to help them out. Also folding it back up can be a pain sometimes.
customer_reviews.author: Marcie Bujnowski

customer_reviews.title: Works for flies not mosquitoes. Not worth 30$
customer_reviews.text: Keeps out flies and huuuuge mosquitoes, not the normal mosquitoes. Kind of a bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Cara B

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: this is the best purchase for my three little baby’s!in the summer.,it is keep us free from mosquitoes and bugs! The product is easy to setup.!the summer coming,i can bring my baby to play in playyeard.it was perfect solution to my problems. Kept the mosquito out! I like the whole thing is netting including the button.this is great product!
customer_reviews.author: xiuping

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t fit king sized bed
customer_reviews.text: Does not fit a king size bed as advertised. It’s also very hard to get a mattress in there because of the zipper space. Bought this for my king sized bed to keep spiders and mosquitoes away, and now I won’t be able to use it because I can’t fit my king sized mattress through the hole. It would be a lot easier if the bottom mesh could zip so that you could put the mesh under your bed and then zip the sides together.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for traveling
customer_reviews.text: This net tent was perfect for my trip to Costa Rica. It fit into my checked bag. Very tiny bugs could get into the tent, but it keeps most of the critters out. It can be difficult to repackage the tent, but it is possible. I was able to fold it multiple times. I recommend practicing beforehand. The zippers seem a little fragile, but I didn't have any issues. I recommend!
customer_reviews.author: MT

customer_reviews.title: Good item but...
customer_reviews.text: Even though I measured, it was more roomy than I thought it would be. I bought this for myself on the deck - I hate wasps - but there is plenty of room for a grandchild or two in there with me. The only downside...good luck trying to put it back in the bag for storage!
customer_reviews.author: Junebug

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Hard to make smaller once you open it. This is huge.
customer_reviews.author: Reviews by Liz.

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: When it just be opened, there is a little smell as new product, but around two days, the smell was gone. However This is really a nice protecter for my baby girl rolling down the bed. Meanwhile, the two little door of it is really cute and convenience. Lol, recall my childhood.
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: This tent is easy to put together & easy to put away when the time comes too. We use it for the beach as well and it'd become our favorite thing to use when we go. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Ruiz

customer_reviews.title: Great and quality mosquito net.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great mosquito net. It almost fit my California King mattress. It is not only protect my family from mosquito but also other insects as well.
customer_reviews.author: Hmoov Ntuj

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Works great, pretty much installs itself :-). Haven't tried to fold back up yet. Happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: A hole
customer_reviews.text: My review was from great to omg I found a hole ! Oh boy . I barely have this less than few days . Please next time inspect the items after arrives .
customer_reviews.author: Giuliana

customer_reviews.title: Great fold up net for Mosquitoes and to keep pets
customer_reviews.text: Great tent for my kids they use this as a way to bond with the sugar gliders we have
customer_reviews.author: Rescue29

customer_reviews.title: As promised (wow, really!)
customer_reviews.text: I love it. It's exactly as listed. Easy to use, works great and refolding is not difficult.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Davis

customer_reviews.title: My favorite must buy!
customer_reviews.text: This perfect little struggle closing it but the second time I got it! It’s fit queens and king size bed! Good for outside and keep bugs away!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kept mosquitoes and other bugs off
customer_reviews.text: Love it. It was pretty easy to set up, kept bugs out which is the most important thing. I couldn't figure out how to fold it back into the bag, but maybe you're smarter than I am lol
customer_reviews.author: KT

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for what I needed. I would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Vonda Beerman

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: I've bought two of these tents now and they work as advertised. The mesh does tear fairly easily but is easy to mend. Much bigger than expected. I put a queen sized mattress topper in one and my daughter loves it. She throws a sheet over the top of the tent when she wants privacy and will play in there for hours.
customer_reviews.author: vicki

customer_reviews.title: Easy install; Good protection
customer_reviews.text: Went back home to the Caribbean in back in spring. Mosquitoes are an issue so is diseases from them. I have to say we were well protected with this net at night. It was easy to install and take down. Will. e ordering g a couple more for when we go down again.
customer_reviews.author: Vanten

customer_reviews.title: Loving it!
customer_reviews.text: This is tent is life-changing. All I ever wanted to do was chill in my backyard without harrasement by mosquitos and other insects. Now I can read, have some wine, snacks, whatever, and I feel protected.
customer_reviews.author: Lcc144

customer_reviews.title: It's great if you don't like bugs ❤️
customer_reviews.text: I love these pop-up tents they are good for your bed for any kind of flying bug it's just great ❤️❤️
customer_reviews.author: Angela hemmitt

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: amazing!we gave this staff a new job!my daughter loved it,she fitted it in our backyard as her secret space,and play inside all the day!
customer_reviews.author: Hellen.J

customer_reviews.title: Nice tent, but challenging
customer_reviews.text: The stitching and workmanship is quite good. It pops up like magic! Getting the genie back into the box can be quite challenging.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: easy to set up and fold
customer_reviews.text: Buy it for the upcoming camping. Just tried it at home, it is not only fancy but also easy to unfold and set up. Light weight but with good quality. Five stars.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and quite big
customer_reviews.text: We really enjoyed this net. Good enough for family of 3 (child upto 6-7 years)
customer_reviews.author: Rahul Chaturvedi

customer_reviews.title: It was useful
customer_reviews.text: It was great and effective against bugs, but after a month the wiring got bent and broke. Not great for long term but quick trips are a go. Too big for any suitcase we had.
customer_reviews.author: Lydia Hardee

customer_reviews.title: Recommendable
customer_reviews.text: It is a very good product that will protect you from mosquitoes. Used it on my deck. Worked fine. A little light and very flimsy but it gets the job done. I will recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: akin frutede

customer_reviews.title: Been using it for about a week and it's great! I would recommend to any one having trouble ...
customer_reviews.text: Been using it for about a week and it's great! I would recommend to any one having trouble sleeping because of Mosquitos!
customer_reviews.author: YenroY

customer_reviews.title: Loved it
customer_reviews.text: I used this when my baby was small so that she could play outside without worrying about bugs. It worked really well and the case is convenient, it folds up small. It did get a small tear in it but this could be from user error.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca W

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Was a great investment for use in Africa in rainy season.
customer_reviews.author: slpgirl

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: We have this outside on the patio and the mosquitos line up on the outisde netting and can't get in. It does have a funny lace trim but it could be easily cut off if user was male or boy (unless they like lace trim).
customer_reviews.author: Faye Hall

customer_reviews.title: Great for Outdoors Too
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I wanted. The fold up is a little confusing, but it does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Reva

customer_reviews.title: Overall good
customer_reviews.text: This thing is huge. The flooring is also netting so I'm sure over time wear and tear will be a issue. But still worth it keeps flying insects away. Ants can still get in
customer_reviews.author: steve

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful tent
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because we moved into a house with a scorpion infestation. Kept the kids safe at night without making them over heated. Fairly durable. Well worth the money!!
customer_reviews.author: Sam Wattinger

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: It works great and it’s easy to fold and unfold just like that. Definitely recommend. You get what you pay for!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Definitely kept the mosquitos out wish the zippers were stronger
customer_reviews.text: We had a little trouble putting it back up but we got it done
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This mosquito net has holes and broken zipper
customer_reviews.text: Completely waste of time and money. It came with holes in the net out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Sudheer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this. It’s very good quality and I can sleep way better now
customer_reviews.author: star

customer_reviews.title: Good Item for bugs not to come in my bed
customer_reviews.text: I can sleep well with this item. In my house, my husband and I are now harassed by roaches roaming around bed room. I could't sleep and my husband either. So we searched for some items for good sleep. And finally this was perfect. Now we can sleep in a peace. Good Good item! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: dash0920

customer_reviews.title: You won’t worry about mosquitoes in this thing!
customer_reviews.text: Received this net quick! It’s very spacious and seems like it will do its job. I had a little trouble folding it back, however the video instructions helped out a lot!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Navarro

customer_reviews.title: Compact
customer_reviews.text: Used for play time with my sugar glider. Easy to put away, light, and worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Kgunn

customer_reviews.title: I personally like this tent
customer_reviews.text: I personally like this tent. I also got it for my Sugar Gliders to play in but have used it for a baby and a couple of toddlers at the cabin. Worked great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Keeps the bugs away and not the Stars
customer_reviews.text: I loved that the mosquitoes cannot bite me when I am in my backyard naked on the futon with my husband.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Hinds

customer_reviews.title: not very easy to figure out how to fold it back
customer_reviews.text: not very easy to figure out how to fold it back, but this is very functional, I bought this for an overseas trip
customer_reviews.author: Sandra.P

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product!
customer_reviews.text: This product is exactly what I was looking for and camequickly! I use it to allow my Sugar Gliders to get stretch there legs.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Buchanan

customer_reviews.title: Ripped.
customer_reviews.text: Ripped when trying to put the air mattress when traveling inside. The air mattress was not aired up either. The zippers were also very easily broken.
customer_reviews.author: Kristyl Aly

customer_reviews.title: They all love it. It is large enough for the whole ...
customer_reviews.text: My wife uses this for her sugar gliders. They all love it. It is large enough for the whole family (4) to fit and small enough to feel comfortable letting the 3 gliders run around and bond.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Reilly

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: It folds and unfolds super easy. Very lightweight. Cheap material is used for sure. Had this tent for a day before my 1 1/2 year olds tore of the zipper and ripped a hole in it.
customer_reviews.author: Elliot Bartell

customer_reviews.title: Great bed net
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and nice to sleep under, especially when one wants to keep flying insects out of reach
customer_reviews.author: iChux

customer_reviews.title: Mosquito net
customer_reviews.text: The quality is good, the packing is very careful, rigorous, tasteless, mosquito proof is essential, no installation.
customer_reviews.author: Emilly

customer_reviews.title: No mosquito bites!
customer_reviews.text: Used this tent in Bali. No mosquito bites while sleeping! Even saw a mosquito hanging onto the outside of the tent when I woke up. Folding it up was a little complicated. Had to youtube it because the directions were difficult to understand.
customer_reviews.author: Edri_joy

customer_reviews.title: If you have sugar gliders, this works perfectly for them!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my sugar gliders and they absolutely love it! I can take them outside too!
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Summer camping no bus on me
customer_reviews.text: It’s a must for summer camping! Works great for hot weather Summer night. No bugs on me lol
customer_reviews.author: Jshar80

customer_reviews.title: Great fully enclosed tent
customer_reviews.text: Great fully enclosed tent, pops and collapses easily. The zipper mechanisms are on the flimsy side so I would recommend lyhandling them gent
customer_reviews.author: Monica Harrich

customer_reviews.title: No mosquito worries during the summer
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to set up, super easy to get working with my bed, despite being a bit too large for my mattress. The zipper is a little flimsy, but considering the cost, it’s still really well made.
customer_reviews.author: EM

customer_reviews.title: Great item. i was surprised at how well it ...
customer_reviews.text: Great item.i was surprised at how well it fit on my king size . Need to get more for the rest of the family.
customer_reviews.author: Tash

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: This pop up worked perfectly. My son and I used it doing our recent trip to Ghana. It was easy to assemble and use. I have no complaints. My only tip is if you leave it up make sure its completely closed when you're not using it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and feel safe from all bugs :)
customer_reviews.author: Eli

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my trip to Ghana and it was wonderful! I used it for 10 nights and the quality was great. No issues with tears or anything.
customer_reviews.author: Tia Patterson

customer_reviews.title: Not getting eaten alive
customer_reviews.text: Definitely protects against bugs and mosquitos. I just can’t fold it back up into the bag. The instructions are difficult to follow.

customer_reviews.title: The mosquitoes can’t get through.
customer_reviews.text: I love that I can sleep in peace and not worry about mosquitoes biting me.

customer_reviews.title: Bug free and sexy as can be.
customer_reviews.text: This is hands down the sexiest mosquito net I have ever worn. Its kind of like sharing tights with your friends. My boyfriend got his hair caught in the zipper so I am only giving it 4 stars. The grass stains come easily.

product_meta.title: Pop-Up Mosquito Net Tent for Beds Anti Mosquito Bites Folding Design with Net Bottom for Babys Adults Trip (79 x71x59 inch)
product_meta.description:
Color:Light BlueIf you are traveling in tropical areas where malaria is prevalent, a mosquito net is the best protection against mosquito bites, malaria and other mosquito-borne diseases.
Mosquito nets are relatively large after folding. If you want to carry them when traveling, you are advised to pack them into a 32-inch ultra-large volume luggage.
Attached the pictures about refolding and stowing methods, Folding is easy. got the key to it in about 5 minutes. Practice folding the bed tent before your trip, so you won't get frustrated. 
This Mosquito Tent itself has bottom.You need to bring your pillows and blankets into the tent for use when sleeping.
In order to install the wire bracket, the edge of each bracket has a gap, this is not a quality problem

STORAGE METHOD-(check the pictures to fold)
1.First locate the elastic retaining loop which is on the front left corner
2.Take the opposite caddy corner and fold it in towards the strap corner
3.Fold the sides together,grasp either side by the corners of the doors
4.Bring your hands together to form a small loop on top and a big loop on bottom
5.Hold on to the side of the big loop and pull it towards and over the other side
6.Use your knee to hold down the other side, this will form two small circles you can fold the small loop down on top of them, tuck in any excess knitting
7.Use the elastic strap band to keep the tent closed
8.Put the bed canopy netting into fabric carrying bag

Please note: The Mosquito net can put on luggage( over 18inch ) when folded up.
Package included:
1 x Mosquito Netting
1xStorage bag.

Package size: 18x18x1.2 inches
Item size:180cm*200cm*150cm, (78.74*70.86*59.05 inches)
feature_bullets: 🔥🔥 PERFECT SIZE: The mosquito net size is L79 x W71 x H59 inch, it’s big enough for 2adults to sleep inside, perfect for queen and king size bed.

🎄 🎄 SPECIAL DESIGN: 31.5''U-Type Double-Door can easy get in/out, AND each door attached two zippers. The BOTTOM is entirely netted, so fully enclosed, it can prevent baby fall from bed. it can keep you from mosquito bites, help you sleep well.

🦄 🦄 HIGH QUALITY: 100% Polyester, Breathable high density mesh, High elastic steel wire support 720 degree free bending, the outside edge sewn beautiful lace. Notice: If you don't like lace, you can consider another model.

🎃🎃 FOLDABLE & PORTABLE: Easy to Pop-Up and Fold , The tent can be washed by hand in warm water and air dried easily. Suit for home and travel. Package Size: 18 x 18 inches, Weight: 1kg. Notice: It can put on luggage( over 18inch ) directly. If you have any questions on folding, pls check the video.
🍹🍹 PERFECT INSTALL: Pops up quickly,don’t require special skills.easy to install,fold down and wash.Built-in high quality double elastic steel wire,support 720 degree free bending.
